participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Caring and supportive, Michael enjoys sharing his interests with others and is always ready to lend a helping hand.
participant_1.background: my father used to work for home depot. horror movies are my favorites. i spent a decade working in the human services field. i'm a stay at home dad. i have a son who is in junior high school.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and enthusiastic, Sarah loves to engage in conversations and is always eager to share her passions and interests.
participant_2.background: i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics. i have a hat collection of over 1000 hats. my favorite season is winter. i've a weakness for vanilla ice cream. i love cats and have two cats.

content.text: Good to see you! I like to read horror movies
I can give you some of them.
Why? By the way I like winter
I am a college student. I am a stay at home mom.
I like blue, reminds me of summer time.
That's cool. I like blue hats.
I love blue. My son is in high school.
